text: Muslim Evloev (11 June 1995 - 6 August 2020) was a Russian-Kyrgyzstani freestyle wrestler. He won a gold medal in his event at the Asian Wrestling Championships and at the Islamic Solidarity Games. Evloev was born in Malgobek, Russia. He was killed in August 2020 during a shoot out in a counter-terrorism operation in Nazran, Russia at the age of 25. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths by firearm Category:Russian sportspeople Category:Kyrgyzstani people Category:Wrestlers
title: Muslim Evloev
